Update `export` usage in README

I was able to get it working as expected by repeating the `-e` flag in pairs.
This updates the README to reflect the usage which works.

message:
a bit hacky, but retrieves "extra fields" from a PR when requested

some fields on a PR are not available when it is retrieved from a List call, this will issue a Get for a single PR if one of those columns is requested (and "cache" it for other columns in the same PR)
summary: a bit hacky, but retrieves "extra fields" from a PR when requested

When using only the image name in docker command, it fails

Merge pull request #5 from augmentable-dev/resolve-local-repos

Resolve local repos

fix improper handling of local repos

previously, if a local path was supplied it could still be parsed by vcsurl without error, but then would fail to resolve into an HTTPS remote, causing an error (rather than falling through and handling the repo as a local one)
summary: fix improper handling of local repos
